revised_title: Retarding the Progress of Fires with Earth: An Experiment by Stephen Hales
tldr: The author, Stephen Hales, conducted an experiment to test the effectiveness of using earth to slow down the spread of fires. He found that covering floors and stairs with earth could help to reduce the intensity and speed of a fire, making it a valuable method for fire prevention and safety.
